scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run android --emulator
scripts.nuke: rm -rf hooks node_modules && cd demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ..
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-confettiview && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.preparedemong: npm run build && cd demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-confettiview && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
